predicate.note: Frames file for 'twine' based on sentences in brown.

example.name: sorta like 'create'
example.text: Hence the title of the book, referring to the soldiers and subjects of the king; on the fatal battlefield of Poltava, to quote from the novel, ``the wreath [0] he twined [*T*-1] for himself slipped down upon his people''.

example.name: with location
example.text: We'd know him by his stretch pants and the flowers [0] he'd wear [*T*-1]-1 twined [*]-1 in his hair.

example.name: canonically with 'around'
example.text: It enclosed her clammy hands and twined around her ankles.
